title: Marijuana Legalization Will Kill Puppies! According To DEA Head

comments.text:
They've run out of excuses to keep marijuana under prohibition, so now it's 
down to "think of the animals" >_<  ..est. annually 300 to 1000 animals are 
being killed by officials doing drug busts, and 1 dog died from not puking 
up butter do to the relaxing effects it got from the cannabis in it... 1 
dog.. versus 1000 .. and *WE* should think of the animals ? Well OK, 
conclusion - Dismantle the DEA = Save the animals !! 

Read this: 
http://www.drugpolicy.org/news/2015/04/dea-administrator-chief-michele-leonhart-expected-resign
﻿

comments.text:
I found something in cough medication that no one else has found in it in 
the 20 years i've used it.  I found a whole new world to enjoy being part 
of and I cannot imagine life without dextromethorphan which is the active 
drug in cough remedies.  It is a slightly dissociative psychedelic 
anesthetic.  If mixed with marijuana as I used to do, it produces the 
greatest creative, and also genius ideas, state of mind!  The two go 
together like butter on toast.  Like milk with chocolate.  I am telling 
this to everyone because it is time for a new generation of people who are 
going to change this world for the better and enjoy life more than they do. 
 I look and see a world full of people who are off and have not been turned 
on yet.  I want to open your minds like in the movie the Matrix.  I learned 
chess really fast and enjoyed learning more than others have.  I guarantee 
you that much.  It makes learning sickly fun like you cannot believe. 
 Spread this everywhere and do it because it is the new world order here. 
 Not to hurt the planet but to help it become something really good.  If 
you all disagree then do me the favor and give me back my tree of life 
because I live a life without life.  My life is very dull and empty and as 
I told others in my own family, I am glad I used the drugs I used in my 
past all the way down to nicotine and benadryl.  But I want my life to have 
marijuana in it if it is safe to inhale it vaporized.  I hope sincerely 
that my lung and a two thirds can handle it and I won't have those feelings 
of shortness of breath when it becomes legal.  You guys shouldn't be 
putting people in prisons and jails for getting high!  That is a sin.  But 
back to the rest of what I was saying is that pot made it fun as hell and I 
created the greatest pieces of art, paintings, pencil, etc. and music while 
intoxicated on marijuana.  It DOES make people more creative and also makes 
them more likely to have the will to do these artistic things.  All of you 
out there who have it made and are growing dope and and or know people who 
do and you have it are afraid to let everyone know about it because of the 
laws and I don't blame you but somehow we have to change this place because 
it is sinful for people like me to Not have it anymore.  It is MY life and 
not for others to tell me that I CANT have that plant.  It is a SIN. 
 Especially if it turns out to be pieces of the tree of life!  Like it says 
in the revelation in the new earth, which isn't part of this one because 
this one is going to hell infinitely small and hot, the tree of life is 
given freely for the healing of nations.  Some people might think this 
earth should be the new earth and the tree given freely?  And the goal of 
all people should be to feel good and the only downside being addiction? 
 If it grows freely then everyone should be happy.  All the plants in the 
earth with psychedelic properties are good if you learn to use them to open 
your mind and learn about yourself and your existence and stuff.  I even 
grow morning glories for their use.  It is stupid period to place people in 
jail for using any of these things and we can change this if we just all 
come together and change the earth.  Why doesn't everyone want to make the 
planet a better place?  Well I already know why and I told you if you go to 
my web page Jacob Baugh Louisville, Ky.  Satan doesn't want us to have 
heaven.  Satan wants misery and war.  So we should want this place to be 
like heaven!  What is in heaven that is written is the tree of life!  So 
why not make this place heaven?  Throw the devil off the planet.  If you 
wonder why god would even have the devil here is because this first heaven 
and earth is going to vanish infinite heat and pain and all the evil stuff 
was here for that purpose so it goes bye bye forever.  There is a new 
place.  What makes a person what he or she is and knows they exist right 
now.  IS it even deeper than atoms and there arrangement?~  By my music and 
stuff at iTunes ;)﻿

comments.text:
First kids, then driving under the influence and now dogs, cmon get real 
DEA. On the kids, I agree that they should not smoke weed, but what's wrong 
with ID requirements to get it, just like alcohol. Then driving while high, 
uh first off when you get high everything seems to be a little slower, so 
you would be a little more cautious and drive slow, right? Personally if I 
feel too high I'd rather not drive in the first place but if you compare it 
to alcohol, it's a completely different affect. Driving drunk and I've done 
this, I drive fast, wreckless and in denial that i'm drunk without thinking 
about others safety or my own. Which is wrong, and that's why I really 
don't like alcohol I would rather smoke me a joint instead and relax and 
chill. Now dogs.... I don't even know what's up with this excuse, I have a 
dog and I keep my weed in a drawer where she cannot get it, plain and 
simple. Conclusion: The DEA is full of dumb excuses and they know it( when 
it comes to marijuana ). Legalize it and you will see improvements around 
our country, guaranteed.      ﻿

comments.author: wyatt berrong

comments.text:
The government should outlaw couches because of the potential health risks 
of using them too much. And while they're at it, why not outlaw grizzly 
bears because of the potential health risks that come from encountering 
one? let's just eradicate all the bears. And maybe outlawing nails would 
also be a good idea because of the potential for them to become rusty and 
end up stuck in our foot somehow, leading to tetanus...OR How about 
outlawing string? if a psychopath gets ahold of some it could lead to 
somebody being choked to death? FUCK IT, lets criminalize everything. 
Problem solved.﻿
comments.author: diegobrown19
